name: Neon Ball by Magatama Studio
description:
Neon ball is a third-person platformer game.  Your objective is to cross the map avoiding the obstacles and reach the end  in the shortest time possible, if you fall, or if you touch an obstacle, you will return to start the map, and time will not stop.

Characteristics:

-Generally all the art is neon

-It has peculiar particles

-Replay

-Two local players mode (Cooperative)

-Different levels/maps

BE THE BALL
